title: New: SUNKEN – Recompose
body:
South East London outfit **SUNKEN** dropped a potential filled debut midway through last year – and have now followed it up with another utterly unique track.

_Recompose_ merges elements of Lily Allen-esque story telling with almost drum and bass inspired production; it’s rammed with personality and hints at an act with unbridled ambition. SUNKEN play at The Nines in Peckham this evening, 23 Feb. Check out Recompose below.
